name: Vomitorial Corpulence
description: '''Vomitorial Corpulence''' was a [[Christian metal|Christian]] [[goregrind]] band that originated in [[Melbourne]], Australia. The band was started by Paul Green. The band's name is inspired by [[Book of Revelation|Revelation]] 3:15-16. Along with fellow Melbourne band [[Mortification (band)|Mortification]], it was highly influential in the innovation of [[Christian death metal]] in the early 1990s.
